name: melt (linseyray)
description:
melt is a tiny experiment for the first Emotions & Feelings Jam.

The theme was Intimacy.

My goal was to use two circles to convey feelings of intimacy in a simple and abstract way,
specifically the energetic & 'melting' feelings of touch and not-touching.

~~~

Controls
hold left or right mouse button
F for full-screen

Music
'Wet Riffs' by Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
